reviews.review: um jogo bom pra qm tem amigo se tambem pra qm nÃ£o tem acredite tenho experiencia :)

This game may be just a modern Portal but, it is really so much more than that. Through its unique level design an superb visual storytelling you feel like you truly impact the story line, the way intended yet creatively and irregular.
This game made me feel emotions towards a game which I never knew i could've felt. Even as I have grown from kid to teen this game still holds up amazingly well compared to other modern day games.
lose your mind in the gel asylum and fight an idiot with the moon

This game is amazing. The main story is so fun, and even after watching a few youtubers play this before I played it myself, the puzzles are still challenging, and so much fun! I love making new chambers using the chamber creator. I love it so much!
Great story, great mechanics, great graphics. A great game all around.

This is literally my favourite game I've ever played. All of it's fantastic, the story, the mechanics, the music, the voice acting, the character writing, the comedy, I love everything about this game and the best part it, is that it's challenging. It's not just story, or mechanics. The puzzles can sometimes take me ages to even wrap my head around, it's brilliant at making your brain think in intuitive and creative ways.

 Long story short, this game will be very hard to top as my favourite game of all time, if at all.

Steps to make your game the best of the year:
1. Make the player wake up to have a robot tell you that you have brain damage
2. Have that same robot screw everything up at your chance of escape
3. Have a bigger robot insult you throughout most of the game and make the insults funny
4. Make dimensional gun that can cause the player to have mass amounts of confusion at times.
5. Have the best voice lines & animations of that generation
6. Make the game only cost $10
Slap that all to together and you have yourself a great game.

an amazing sequel to an amazing game! portal 2 is more story rich than the first one as well as some very interesting new mechanics, however the decisions they made in terms of design caused some continuity errors between the two games. regardless, this game looks gorgeous and is addicting, i recommend it to everyone. Portal 2 is the greatest sequel to the most iconic puzzle game of all time. Hilarious, fun, brain melting and I'm sure it's great in co-op, too. The only par that sucks is if you have motion sickness, it gets hard to play, so it will be best to take breaks to come back to reality. Over-all, 10/10. It also has a free mod to play, so that's another plus.

Jogo muito intrigante e com desafios muito mais desafiadores que o Portal 1, muito bom

The pinnacle of gaming. It gets almost everything right about the first game and goes above and beyond in the most spectacular and awe-inspiring ways you didn't know were possible. Literally everything about this game is practically pure perfection and should be praised for decades to come. It's actually mental how Valve pulled it off, it's incredible. The perplexing gameplay, the story, the writing and the HUMOR, just everything is just *chef's kiss* magnificent. This is one of my favorite games of all time. I love it dearly with all my heart.
